title: Harmony Row
creator_credit: Frank Thring and Efftee Film Productions
brief_description: This production stars George Wallace as a policeman who is assigned to Harmony Row, a notorious haunt of thugs and criminals. On the beat he makes many friends and is finally persuaded to fight Slogger Lee, the biggest trouble maker in Harmony Row, in a boxing tournament.
